summary: The 'Pay Our Coast Guard Parity Act of 2025' addresses Coast Guard pay during government funding lapses. The bill amends Title 14 of the United States Code to ensure Coast Guard military and civilian personnel, as well as qualified contract employees, receive pay and benefits even if appropriations are delayed. It defines a 'Coast Guard-specific funding lapse' and outlines the conditions for these appropriations, including payment of death gratuities, funeral travel, and housing allowances. The bill specifies the duration of the appropriations and how they will be charged to future budgets.
